name: function 4
README
info:
# Introduction

This flow is used to push CC100 data collected
over certain periods of time to influx database.

# Format

 - cc100data
    - digital
        - time | inputsbyte | outputsbyte
    - analogue
        - time | input1 | input2 | output1 | output2
    - temperature
        - time | pt1 | pt2
 - logs
    TBC
